title: Wild magic
text: Roll twice on the %DESCRIPTION-ROD-OF-WONDER=Rod of Wonder% table.

title: Magic fatigue
text: You cannot cast any spells for 1 round.

title: You made him stronger
text: The target gains %ADVANTAGE=advantage% on %ABILITY-STR=Str% checks and melee attacks for 1d4 rounds.

title: Clatto verata necktie
text: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical hit.

title: Hit by the ugly forest
text: You take 1d3 point of %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: The magic is gone
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

title: Can you hear me now?
text: You are %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed% (DC 15 Medicine check).

title: Error!
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Why me?
text: You provoke an opportunity attack from all threatening foes.

title: Left reeling
text: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw negates%).

title: Nothing to fear
text: You are %STATUS-FRIGHTENED=frightened% for 2d4 rounds.

title: Bleeding eyes
text: You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d4 rounds and %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Acidic backlash
text: You take 2d6 points of acid damage.

title: Backblast
text: The attack hits you and is a critical hit.

title: Arcane fire
text: You take 2d6 points of fire damage.

title: Electrical feedback
text: You take 2d6 points of electricity damage.

title: Cursed
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% attack rolls, saves and ability checks. This effect can only be cured with Remove curse.

title: You made him faster
text: The target is Hasted for 1d4 rounds.

title: You made him tougher
text: The target gains damage resistance against bludgeoning, piercing and slashing attacks for 1d4 rounds.

title: Vertigo
text: You are %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Apprentice move
text: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded).

title: Not me, you fool!
text: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target.

title: Tiring spell
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Tangled
text: You become %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% with your gear until you spend an action to free yourself.

title: Nose bleed
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Weakened
text: You take a -2 penalty to all your Spell DCs for 1d4 minutes.

title: Poor trade
text: The attack hits your intended target but you must lose a spell or slot of the highest available level (your choice).

title: Distance rift
text: You are teleported the nearest position adjacent to the target.

title: Mind drain
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% to %ABILITY-INT=Int%, %ABILITY-WIS=Wis%, or %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% (determined randomly).

title: Cold snap
text: You take 2d6 points of cold damage.

title: Caster's block
text: You cannot cast this spell for 24 hour.

title: You made him bigger
text: Target increases one size category for 1d4 rounds.

title: Weak-minded fool
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on %ABILITY-WIS=Wisdom% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Power down
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on %ABILITY-INT=Intelligence% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Mental slip
text: On his next turn, your target may give you one Suggestion.

title: Power transfer
text: The highest level spell effect on you is transferred to your target.

title: Magical vacuum
text: 1d3 spell effects active on you are dispelled (determined randomly).

title: Blastoff
text: You are thrown 1d6 × 10 feet into the air (or in a random direction if flying) (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Int saving throw negates%).

title: It's sparkly
text: You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Now I see you!
text: Your target becomes %STATUS-INVISIBLE=invisible% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Unexpected blast
text: The spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect.

title: Jumbled components
text: You can only take a move next round.

title: Spell shield
text: The target gains %ADVANTAGE=advantage% on saving throws against your spells for 1d6 rounds.

title: Side effect
text: One of your magic items permanently gains a %DESCRIPTION-ITEM-DRAWBACKS=random drawback%.

title: This is hard
text: You have %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on %ABILITY-CON=Constitution% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Magical smackdown
text: You automatically fail your next saving throw.

title: Reflection
text: The spell hits you instead of the target (normal saves apply).

title: Monster rift
text: Your spell is converted to a Summon monster spell of the same level. The monster attacks you.

title: Fragmented magic
text: 1d4+2 Mirror images spring up around your target. These images last for 1 minute or until destroyed.

title: How did that happen?
text: A Stinking cloud appears, centered on you.

title: Energy transfer
text: Lose one randomly determined spell or spell slot. Your target can cast this spell next round.

title: Power drain
text: You lose one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly).
